name: Don'tForgetMe(DEMO)
description:
So far I have spent a week developing this demo, including scripting and modeling. I am impatient with what I have already done. It may be because of other things in life. I will continue to develop this demo when I have time. Make it a complete horror game.The current game quality is still very rough.

The current elements in the DEMO include: four enemies, a gun, a branch, and a flashlight.

Play tips: move WASD, the mouse controls LOOK, the F key turns on the flashlight, 1 or 2 switch between two weapons.
